description.value:
You change your body to better suit the moment. You gain one of the following abilities of your choice. You can Dismiss this spell.

  • You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Speed)]{20-foot status bonus to your Speed}.
  • You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Climb Speed)]{climb} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Swim Speed)]{swim} Speed equal to half your Speed.
  • You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Darkvision)]{darkvision}.
  • You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Claws)]{pair of claws}. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage.
  • You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Scent)]{scent 60 feet (imprecise)}.
